GEORGE HOTEL'S Virtual Tour !\u003c/a\u003e\u003c/p\u003e\u003cp\u003eSt. George Hotel Dubai. \r\nThe hotel features a wide range of outlets including Tip Top English Disco, a traditional Arabian restaurant, Tivoli Bar and Cafe, \r\nIrani Night club, and 24 hour coffee shop. Rooms offer panoramic views of Dubai Creek and Old Town and include minibar and air conditioning.\r\n\u003cbr\u003e\u003c/p\u003e\u003cp\u003eÂ \u003c/p\u003e\u003cp\u003e\u003cstrong\u003eUAE Virtual Tours. 360 panorama photos with interactive map from Abu Dhabi, Dubai, Sharjah, Ajman, Umm al-Quwain, Ras al-Khaimah, Fujairah.\u003c/strong\u003e\u003c/p\u003e\u003cp\u003e\u003cstrong\u003e\u003ca href=\"http://360emirates.com\" title=\"Emirates Virtual Tours\" rel=\"nofollow\" target=\"_blank\"\u003eVisit Emirates Virtual Tours at 360emirates.com\u003c/a\u003e\u003cstrong\u003e\u003c/strong\u003e\u003c/strong\u003e\u003c/p\u003e", "licensed": true, "licenseable": true, "author": { "name" : "360emirates.com", "id" : "360emirates_com", "ranking" : ["expert"], "url" : "/profile/360emirates_com", "image" : "//360-profile-pics.s3.amazonaws.com/User/3376_128" },
